description: Text transform on cells in column Change Date using expression grel:value.substring(4,7)

expression: grel:if(and(inArray(['AARGH','Judaica','Middle East','Slavic','Greek','Korean'],cells.Triage.value),not(cells['BIB Heading Before'].value.startsWith('Initials:'))),cells.Triage.value + ' | ' + cells['Change Date'].value,'Not processed'+ ' | ' + cells['Change Date'].value)
description: Create column Batch at index 22 based on column Triage using expression grel:if(and(inArray(['AARGH','Judaica','Middle East','Slavic','Greek','Korean'],cells.Triage.value),not(cells['BIB Heading Before'].value.startsWith('Initials:'))),cells.Triage.value + ' | ' + cells['Change Date'].value,'Not processed'+ ' | ' + cells['Change Date'].value)
